IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROMOTE RELIGIOUS, EDUCATIONAL, CULTURAL AND CHARITABLE PROJECTS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROMOTE RELIGIOUS, EDUCATIONAL, CULTURAL AND CHARITABLE PROJECTS.
IRS990.Desc: ASSIST THE INTERNATIONAL INSTITUTE OF ISLAMIC THOUGHT (IIIT) IN ITS EFFORTS TO PROVIDE RELIGIOUS, EDUCATIONAL, CULTURAL, CHARITABLE, AND HUMANITARIAN PROGRAMS AND SERVICES. THIS ASSISTANCE INCLUDES DONATED USE OF FACILITIES AT 500 GROVE STREET, 2ND FLOOR, ROOM 200 IN HERNDON, VIRGINIA. IIIT USES MOST OF SPACE FOR ITS OFFICES. ESTIMATED COST OF THE DONATED USE OF FACILITIES IS $569,745.

OtherSecuritiesGrp.Desc: INVESTMENT IN UNIV ISLAMIC FINANCIAL AL JAZARI INST

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO FUND EXEMPT ORGANIZATIONS FOR SOCIAL, CHARITABLE AND COMMUNITY ACTIVITIES AND TO HOLD THE PROCEEDS OF AN EDUCATIONAL BENEFIT TRUST.

AccountActivitiesOutsideUSGrp.RegionTxt: MIDDLE EAST AND NORTH AFRICA, EGYPT

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: IIIT IS A SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION OF SAFA TRUST INC.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL GRANTS, INCLUDING THOSE TO SAFA'S SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION, IIIT, ARE APPROVED BY BOARD MEMBERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DR. HISHAM ALTALIB AND DR. AHMAD TOTONJI (BOTH DIRECTORS AND OFFICERS) ARE BROTHERS-IN-LAW. DR. AHMAD TOTONJI (DIRECTOR AND OFFICER) IS THE FATHER OF OMER TOTONJI (DIRECTOR) AND IS THE FATHER IN LAW OF DR. AHMED ALWANI (DIRECTOR). DR. AHMED ALWANI (DIRECTOR) IS THE BROTHER-IN-LAW OF OMER TOTONJI (DIRECTOR). DR. HISHAM ALTALIB (DIRECTOR AND OFFICER) IS THE FATHER OF HASAN ALTALIB (DIRECTOR). DR. HISHAM ALTALIB (DIRECTOR AND OFFICER) IS THE UNCLE OF OMER TOTONJI (DIRECTOR).

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE MANAGEMENT WILL FORWARD THE FORM 990 TO THE TRUSTEES OF THE BOARD AND WILL REQUEST THEM TO REVIEW AND REVERT BACK WITH THEIR APPROVAL OR FEEDBACK. THE MANAGEMENT WILL RESPOND TO ALL FEEDBACK AND MAKE FORM 990 ADJUSTMENTS IF NEEDED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE POLICY WAS ADOPTED IN 2019. THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES WILL BE PRESENTED WITH THE DISCLOSURE FORM AT THE END OF 2020 TO REPORT ANY CONFLICTS OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PUBLICLY AVAILABLE SURVEYS ARE REVIEWED IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE JOB DESCRIPTIONS AND ANNUAL ACCOMPLISHMENTS IN DETERMINING THE COMPENSATION OF THE EMPLOYEES OF THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AN INTERESTED PARTY WILL CONTACT THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCE DEPARTMENT BY EMAIL OR CALL AND THE DEPARTMENT WILL PROVIDE THE REQUESTED DOCUMENT TO THE PARTY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AN INTERESTED PARTY WILL CONTACT THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCE DEPARTMENT BY EMAIL OR CALL AND THE DEPARTMENT WILL PROVIDE THE REQUESTED DOCUMENT TO THE PARTY.
